mapper.sql: id, uid, bid, startTime, rideTime, distance, amount
mapper.insert:
insert into journeys
id,
uid,
bid,
startTime,
rideTime,
distance,
amount,

mapper.update:
update journeys
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=CHAR},
bid = #{bid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
rideTime = #{rideTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
distance = #{distance,jdbcType=INTEGER},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update journeys set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=CHAR}, bid = #{bid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rideTime = #{rideTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, distance = #{distance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
